content:
Set-AzureRmRecoveryServicesVaultContext

Sets vault context.

Syntax

Set-AzureRmRecoveryServicesVaultContext -Vault <ARSVault> [<CommonParameters>]

Description

The Set-AzureRmRecoveryServicesVaultContext cmdlet sets the vault context for Azure Site Recovery services.

Examples

1:

Parameters

-Vault

Specifies the name of the vault. The vault must be an AzureRmRecoveryServicesVault object.

Type:ARSVault
Required:True
Position:Named
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByValue)
Accept wildcard characters:False
